name: Mini Game Collection
description:
Welcome to the page of our first game project. The Mini Game Collection contains many games from small to big. These are mainly games that everyone has played or at least heard of.

These games are currently focused on local play (hotseat). The number of players varies from 1 - 2 (currently). Playing against an AI is still under development.

Games that have been created:

- Tic Tac Toe

- Rock Paper Scissor

- Hangman

Games that are in work:

- Snake

- UNO

Games on the TO-DO list:

- Battleships

- Pong

- BlackJack

- Four win

- Pool

- Man, Don't Get Angry

- and a suprise game

We hope you like our little start project with the minigames. Suggestions for improvement, additions or tips are welcome! :-)
